TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_lasubu, title = lasubu, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/lasubu} }

S.FORM: === lasubu 百 === cacay a lasubu ku tayniay miidang. 有一百個人來這裡玩. makalasubu 一百 makalasubu tu ku mihecaan ni baki nu maku. .
=== lasobo 百 === cacay a lasobo ko tayniay miidang. 有一百個人來這裡玩. makalasobo 一百 makalasobo to ko mihecaan ni baki no mako. .
